remarks: The given ` if ` term is an integer.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
statement:
etransclem3.n $e |- ( ph -> P e. NN ) $.
etransclem3.c $e |- ( ph -> C : ( 0 ... M ) --> ( 0 ... N ) ) $.
etransclem3.j $e |- ( ph -> J e. ( 0 ... M ) ) $.
etransclem3.4 $e |- ( ph -> K e. ZZ ) $.
etransclem3 $p |- ( ph -> if ( P < ( C ` J ) , 0 , ( ( ( ! ` P ) / ( ! ` ( P - ( C ` J ) ) ) ) x. ( ( K - J ) ^ ( P - ( C ` J ) ) ) ) ) e. ZZ ) $.
